meanings.definition: The quality or state of being strenuous.
meanings.sent1: Her strenuosities in training paid off with a gold medal.
meanings.sent2: The coach admired the team's strenuosities during the intense match.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel's strenuosities to gather nuts were quite impressive.
meanings.sent4: His dedication to his work showed in the strenuosities he put in every day.
meanings.sent5: The marathon runner's strenuosities were evident in the way he pushed through the race.

meanings.definition: The exertion of great effort or energy.
meanings.sent1: Despite her strenuosities, she couldn't lift the heavy box.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers showed incredible strenuosities in completing the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat's strenuosities to catch the laser pointer entertained the whole family.
meanings.sent4: The artist's strenuosities in creating the masterpiece were truly inspiring.
meanings.sent5: The firefighter's strenuosities saved many lives during the blazing fire.

meanings.definition: The condition of being vigorous or active.
meanings.sent1: The puppy's strenuosities in the park brought joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent2: The garden thrived due to the plant's natural strenuosities.
meanings.sent3: The child's strenuosities in playing made the playground lively.
meanings.sent4: The river flowed with the strenuosities of a powerful current.
meanings.sent5: The city buzzed with the strenuosities of a busy day.
